d.Name: SAP ERP Integration with itx.scale Adapter
d.Description:
The integration of SAP ERP System with the it.x-scale adapter allows to connect electronic scales from many manufactures like Bizerba, Bruss, Schenck to the SAP ERP System.

  • With the adapter you can connect multiple scales parallel.
  • Scales with an ethernet port can be connected
d.ShortText: Connect your electronic scales with your SAP ERP System with the itx.scale Adapter
